title: Looking for passionate players
body:
I am looking for players who can be dedicated to trying to play professionally in time. You must want to play in a team environment and be very active, we will be looking to play everyday and train consistently both individually and as a team.

You must be willing to learn new champions and master them.
You must be over 16 years old
You must be able to use voice comms
You must have a professional attitude and be able to commit your time to a team.

IGN: whitepumah

replies.body:
I'd love to play in a very nice team environment. 
Consider me, I hope I won't disappoint

I'll be happy to join, been hoping to join a team for while now.
I main ADC but can play all lanes.

*Love The Rift
*Drive to improve 
*Good attitude

Hope i get the chance to try out

im keen.
d5 adc. but am capable in any role
